ai-kv14.2:1.1_0: The six sense fields appear in their mother’s womb, not stabilized in their mother’s womb.
ai-kv14.2:1.3_0: he is about totally injured from the Aṅgiyānī.
ai-kv14.2:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:2.3_0: the bowl stands with their hands, the mind becomes stabilized.
ai-kv14.2:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:3.5_0: the bowl stands with their hands, the mind becomes stabilized.
ai-kv14.2:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:4.1_0: the one in the mother’s womb, and if she feels it, becomes something else.
ai-kv14.2:4.3_0: he does a legal procedure against his mother’s womb,
ai-kv14.2:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:4.10_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:5.1_0: The mother-in-law, when she comes back from her mother’s womb, no longer in the sense of urgency,
ai-kv14.2:5.3_0: she produces a skeleton in the mother’s womb.
ai-kv14.2:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.2:6.2_0: “Don’t come back from the mother’s womb, nor do they get faded away.”
ai-kv14.2:7.3_0: next it becomes a piece of flesh;
ai-kv14.2:7.5_0: From that swelling the limbs appear,
ai-kv14.2:7.6_0: head hairs, body hairs, and nails
ai-kv14.2:8.2_0: the food and drink that she consumes—
ai-kv14.2:8.4_0: the person in the mother’s womb.”
ai-kv14.2:9.3_0: Therefore, because his mother-in-law comes back from there, the hairs don’t get dishevelled.
ai-kv14.2:9.4_0: The account of the six sense fields is finished.
